description: Kagemune is an Salamander player at ALO. He leads lancers team. While he attempts to hunt Leafa, his squad is taken down by Kirito. After Kirito`s fight with Eugene, he lied about an Undine being in the party that wiped the party he led the day before, in order to support Kirito`s story and convinced Eugene to believe that Kirito was an ambassador of a supposed Undine and Spriggan alliance.
name: Kagemune
